item.description:
http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=145910935479690

CNHT ANNUAL PICNIC - SATURDAY JULY 9, 2011 CNHT's Annual Taxpayer Reunion Picnic is slated for Saturday July 9, 2011 from 12 Noon to 4:00 PM at the American Legion #59 - 538 West Main Street, Hillsborough, NH 03244. Tables are $100 for Presidential candidates and free for local groups. Traditionally the first straw poll of the season, it is a 'must attend'! Good friends, good politics, and lots of food to be had! Price is $15 for all you can eat, children under 12 free. Talk show host MIKE BALL will serve as our EMCEE! ALL PRESIDENTIAL, Congressional, and State CANDIDATES encouraged to attend. PRESIDENTIAL and Congressional Candidates: Please contact webmaster@cnht.org for information on speaking info. PURCHASE TICKETS ONLINE: http://www.cnht.org/picnic2011.php
item.name: Vote for Ron at "first straw poll of the season" - CNHT Annual Picnic
